com.gotenna.sdk.data

Class GTStoreDateTimeEmergencyManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.gotenna.sdk.data.GTStoreDateTimeEmergencyManager

  • public final class GTStoreDateTimeEmergencyManager
extends java.lang.Object
    A singleton that controls when the StoreDateTimeEmergency command is sent to the goTenna. Automatically send the command once every minutes.

    The command lets the goTenna know what the current time is.

    It also sets a pre-formatted emergency message to be stored that contains the user's name and gps coordinates.

    The emergency message that is set will be sent from the goTenna if the user taps the reset button on the goTenna 3 times.

    To update the user's gps coordinates for the emergency message, use UserDataStore.getCurrentUser() along with User.updateLocation(double, double, float, long) .

    The message is automatically sent once every minute, and will use the new gps coordniates and message if they are updated.

    Created on 8/25/15.

    • Method Detail

      • getInstance

        public static GTStoreDateTimeEmergencyManager getInstance()

      • setEmergencyMessage

        public void setEmergencyMessage(java.lang.String emergencyMessage)
        Sets the emergency message to be set periodically on the goTenna. This message will be cached via SharedPreferences for later.
        Parameters:
        emergencyMessage - The new emergency message.

      • getEmergencyMessage

        public java.lang.String getEmergencyMessage()
        The emergency message to be set periodically on the goTenna. A default message will be returned if no message has been set before via setEmergencyMessage(String).
        Returns:
        The emergency message.

      • isDefaultEmergencyMessage

        public boolean isDefaultEmergencyMessage()
        Determines if the manager is currently using the default emergency message or a custom one.
        Returns:
        True if using the default message, false otherwise.

      • setIsDisabled

        public void setIsDisabled(boolean isDisabled)
        Enables/Disables the periodic sending of the StoreDateTimeEmergency message to the goTenna.
        Parameters:
        isDisabled - Indicates if we want to disable the periodic sending or not.

      • startListening

        public void startListening()
        Starts listening for Connected and disconnected events so that the singleton knows when to periodically send out the StoreDateTimeEmergency message to be stored on the goTenna.
